title: The Exchange: Italy's almost premier
description:
Carlo Cottarelli talks about how he nearly led a caretaker government after President Sergio Mattarella last month rejected a euroskeptic finance minister put forward by the parties that won March elections. The former IMF economist has some advice for Italy’s new bosses.   See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.
